dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3969 IH: Military Access to Reproductive Care and Health for Military Servicemembers Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Houlahan (for herself, Ms. Strickland, and Ms. Jacobs) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to repeal the restriction on the use of funds and facilities of the Department of Defense for abortion care.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Military Access to Reproductive Care and Health for Military Servicemembers Act or the MARCH for Military Servicemembers Act.

section.header: Repeal of restriction on use of funds and facilities of Department of Defense for abortion care
section.text: Section 1093 of title 10, United States Code, is repealed.
